pull.title: [docs] update transifex doc link
pull.body:
The old link is no longer working.

#13364

events.body: Why open a new PR? Better to keep the history together IMO. I recommend re-opening the prior PR.
@Empact When rebasing, I accidentally rewrote the commit previous to that. To keep history, I linked it.

utACK after fixing the typo. 
In future please don't open new PRs for the same changes.
